q: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
h:
“There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.” —
Colin Powell

q: Peace begins with a smile.
h:
“Peace begins with a smile.” —
Mother Teresa

q: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
h:
“Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still. ” —
Chinese Proverb

q: Do not think you will necessarily be aware of your own enlightenment.
h:
“Do not think you will necessarily be aware of your own enlightenment.” —
Dogen

q: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
h:
“The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.” —
Alfred Adler

q: Enjoy every minute of life. Never second-guess life.
h:
“Enjoy every minute of life. Never second-guess life.” —
Michael Jordan

q: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
h:
“Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

q: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
h:
“There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.” —
Maya Angelou

q: The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.
h:
“The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.” —
James Allen

q: There is no path to Love. Love is the path.
h:
“There is no path to Love. Love is the path.” —
Dan Millman

q: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
h:
“You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do. ” —
Henry Ford

q: The river that flows in you also flows in me.
h:
“The river that flows in you also flows in me.” —
Kabir

q: Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.
h:
“Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

q: The future doesn't belong to the faint-hearted; it belongs to the brave.
h:
“The future doesn't belong to the faint-hearted; it belongs to the brave.” —
Ronald Reagan

q: Do you have the patience to wait until your mud settles and the water is clear?
h:
“Do you have the patience to wait until your mud settles and the water is clear?” —
Lao Tzu

q: You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!
h:
“You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!” —
John Lennon

q: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
h:
“Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised. ” —
Denis Waitley

q: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
h:
“If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done. ” —
Bruce Lee

q: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.
h:
“Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else. ” —
James Matthew Barrie

q: When you want something in life, you just gotta reach out and grab it.
h:
“When you want something in life, you just gotta reach out and grab it.” —
Christopher McCandless

q: If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.
h:
“If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.” —
Virginia Woolf

q: Every moment you get is a gift. Spend it on things that matter. Don't spend it by dwelling on unhappy things.
h:
“Every moment you get is a gift. Spend it on things that matter. Don't spend it by dwelling on unhappy things.” —
Celestine Chua

q: I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been.
h:
“I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been.” —
Wayne Gretzky

q: If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart.
h:
“If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart.” —
Buddha

q: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadows.
h:
“Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadows.” —
Helen Keller

q: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.
h:
“I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.” —
Steve Maraboli

q: The truly rich men are the ones who have health, loved ones and a work they love.
h:
“The truly rich men are the ones who have health, loved ones and a work they love.” —
Maxime Lagace

q: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
h:
“Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.” —
Carl Bard

q: Your dream has to be bigger than your fear.
h:
“Your dream has to be bigger than your fear.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Wherever you are is the entry point.
h:
“Wherever you are is the entry point.” —
Kabir

q: The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
h:
“The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.” —
Alexander Graham Bell

q: If you want something you've never had you must be willing to do something you've never done.
h:
“If you want something you've never had you must be willing to do something you've never done.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: We shape clay into a pot, but it is the emptiness inside that holds whatever we want.
h:
“We shape clay into a pot, but it is the emptiness inside that holds whatever we want.” —
Lao Tzu

q: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
h:
“Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.” —
Michael Jordan

q: No man can get rich himself unless he enriches others.
h:
“No man can get rich himself unless he enriches others.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: It is ignorance that causes most mistakes.
h:
“It is ignorance that causes most mistakes.” —
Harry S. Truman

q: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
h:
“Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.” —
Rumi

q: Values are like fingerprints. Nobody's are the same, but you leave 'em all over everything you do.
h:
“Values are like fingerprints. Nobody's are the same, but you leave 'em all over everything you do.” —
Elvis Presley

q: Better late than never.
h:
“Better late than never.” —
Spencer Johnson

q: There are no second chances in life, except to feel remorse.
h:
“There are no second chances in life, except to feel remorse.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon

q: If you do not push the boundaries, you will never know where they are.
h:
“If you do not push the boundaries, you will never know where they are.” —
T.S. Eliot

q: Simple words, repeated daily, can change your life.
h:
“Simple words, repeated daily, can change your life.” —
Maxime Lagace

q: We must create our own world or we will die from inaction.
h:
“We must create our own world or we will die from inaction.” —
Robert Greene

q: All great truths begin as blasphemies.
h:
“All great truths begin as blasphemies.” —
George Bernard Shaw

q: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
h:
“To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

q: When a man is penalized for honesty he learns to lie.
h:
“When a man is penalized for honesty he learns to lie.” —
Criss Jami

q: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
h:
“The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.” —
Marcus Aurelius

q: Most of us will do anything to avoid facing ourselves.
h:
“Most of us will do anything to avoid facing ourselves.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: The dream is free, but the hustle is sold separately.
h:
“The dream is free, but the hustle is sold separately.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Most people get ahead during the time that others waste.
h:
“Most people get ahead during the time that others waste.” —
Henry Ford
